page.title: 20GUID NYCHBURRIS (cont)
page.content: {8.50}Company rides out to Mildamhead, then arrives at the Kirkgate Port. The gate is opened and the key is given in charge of the Bailie. {9.00}Company proceeds to Castledykes. {9.35}They stop there,cornet,Lynors and Pursuivant with his men enter & unfurl the flag at the site of the Castle captured by Bruce in 1306. {10.10}Cornet and Pursuivant ride to Maxwelltown War Memorial where Cornet lays a wreath. {10.20}Company follows. They ride to the Old Bridge where Port is opened & the key handed to Bailie. The Provost and Magistrates receive the Pursuivant and Cornet at the Midsteeple.
